content.title: Embed code
content.description: Paste in an embed code. Refer to the guide to understand how to embed your content.

title.title: Description
title.description: Briefly describe what the embedded content is about. This isn’t displayed on the page but is accessible to screen readers.

alt.title: Alternate text
alt.description: Add a descriptive alternative text for this image. This helps visually impaired users to understand your image.

size.title: Image size
size.description: On mobile, images will always fill up to the page width even if you choose “Small”.

href.title: URL Link
href.description: The URL to navigate to when the image is clicked

buttonLabel.title: Button text
buttonLabel.description: A descriptive text. Avoid generic text such as “Click here” or “Learn more”

secondaryButtonLabel.title: Secondary button text
